Jennifer Aniston.passage:
‘Friends’ star’s new beauty product ad featuring her is the worst example of ageism, says readers | Daily Mail Online
Jennifer Aniston is now starring in the brand new commercial for the Olay Regenerist Luminous Blur cream which is not a cream for wrinkles and is all about enhancing your beauty. This new commercial starring Aniston has a tag line, “Age is just a number. Age lies. So you want to look and feel beautiful? “
The Olay advertisement has received some not so nice comments. Aniston who is now 46 years old plays the role of a woman from age 38-45. It seems that some of the viewers of this advertisement think that 46 years old is the new 30 or 35 and that Jennifer Aniston is ‘just’ 38, which is not so true. Aniston and her friends are ‘just’ in their late 40s. She even says in this video that in just a few years time she will be in her 50’s. I can understand people having a ‘problem’ with age. I have my 32 year old cousin who will be 33 soon who is ‘just’ 4 years old. People see the world around them and that’s how the see things and their age, but they are the one who think age is an issue. I remember Jennifer Aniston in Friends when she was just 25.

Magnolia.passage: "Magnolia is a genus of about 80–130 species of flowering plants in the magnoliid family Magnoliales. Some species of Magnolia are considered the most important of all the flowering plants in terms of size and quantity. Magnolia trees are large and beautiful, with many species flowering in the spring, but many species will not produce flowers for decades. Magnolia trees are among the best-scented flowers in early spring. Their flowers are often a mixture of white, yellow, pink and lilac. Magnolia is most famous for its flowers, but the fruit, and to some extent the leaves and bark, are also very important. Many species are susceptible to Magnolia scale, which is a fungal disease caused by Magnolia Scale Wasp. Magnolia scale also affects the Magnolia Crab Apple. Magnolia species are among the easiest and most popular shrubs for home gardens, and many are native to North America. Magnolia was the state tree of Magnolia, Virginia, and also the national tree of Magnolia, Virginia, where the first Magnolia to be brought into cultivation was Magnolia virginiana. Magnolia is a member of the Magnoliaceae family, which is a large and diverse family of species, many of which are used in cultivation." Robert Zemeckis.passage: Robert Zemeckis was born 5th October 1956 in Champaign Illinois USA, to a German American mother, and a Hungarian-Jewish father. Scottsdale.passage: "Scottsdale has the highest per capita population of any city in Arizona. The city is a major shopping and entertainment destination. The main shopping areas include Scottsdale Fashion Square and Arizona Center Mall. The city is home to several of the largest stores in Arizona, such as Macy's and Nordstrom. Scottsdale also has numerous specialty shops and boutiques, as well as a variety of fine restaurants. In 2007, the city ranked as the 12th most popular resort destination in the United States, according to travel writer Patricia Schultz. In 2006, it was listed as the most visited small city in the country by the 100th anniversary of AAA. The city is located in a valley surrounded by the Tortilla Mountains. The population was 1,945,565 at the 2000 census, 171,414 in 2000 and 186,089 at the 2000 census. The city is the fourth largest city in Arizona after Phoenix, Tucson, and Mesa. The city was the location of the annual Phoenix Open Golf Tournament and the FBR Open at the TPC Scottsdale. The city is home to many golf courses, and is also the location of the largest man-made lake in the world, Lake Cochise. The city is a suburb of Phoenix, and is a separate incorporated city. The city is within the Maricopa County boundaries, and it is part of the Phoenix metropolitan area.

qae_pairs.question: Question: What are the names of the mountains surrounding the city of Scottsdale?
qae_pairs.explanation: Tortilla is derived from the Spanish word tortilla, which means flatbread. The Tortilla Mountains are located in the northwest corner of Scottsdale. They are part of the Sonoran Desert, and are part of the Tortilla Mountains Wilderness Area.

qae_pairs.explanation: Scottsdale is located in Maricopa County, Arizona. The county seat is Phoenix. The county was established in 1871 and was named after the city of Scottsdale, Arizona. qae_pairs.question: What was Emma Stone doing in Scottsdale in 2007?
qae_pairs.explanation: Emma Stone was born in Scottsdale, Arizona on November 6, 1988. She attended the Scottsdale Community College and graduated from the University of Arizona.
